name: css-word-wrap
description: Css module of single purpose classes for word wrap

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-word-wrap.css > css/css-word-wrap.css && tachyons src/css-word-wrap.css --minify > css/css-word-wrap.min.css && tachyons src/css-word-wrap.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
